remarks:
Ordering on reals is transitive.  Axiom 19 of 22 for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axpre-lttrn .  Note:  The more general version for extended reals is ~ axlttrn .  Normally new proofs would use ~ lttr .  (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.) 

---

 Ordering on reals is transitive.  Axiom for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axpre-lttrn .  (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)
statement: ax-pre-lttrn $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR ) -> ( ( A <RR B /\ B <RR C ) -> A <RR C ) ) $.
